casebody.data:
Michael E. BOS, Petitioner-Appellee/Cross-Appellant,
v.
CLIMATE ENGINEERS, INC., and The Hartford Fire Insurance, Respondents-Appellants/Cross-Appellees. No. 17-0159 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed November 22, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Reversed on Appeal; Affirmed on Cross Appeal.
